name: Donkey Kong Jr. (itch)
description:
Playable 3D simulation of this   classic handheld electronic game including views of the original packaging and instruction guide . A RetroFab simulation Version 0.9.1 (beta) Details Title Donkey Kong Jr. Model No. CJ-93 Manufacturer Nintendo Series Game & Watch (Panorama Screen) Release Date October 4, 1983 Chipset Sharp SM511 ( 32.768 kHz ) Description

The release of Donkey Kong Jr. in the innovative Panorama Screen color LCD format in 1983, with it's tilt-able screen, managed to offer the same experience as the game of the same title released in the earlier Table Top Series but in a more portable format and affordable price.

Gameplay

Donkey Kong has been captured and chained up by Mario. Donkey Kong Jr. must rescue his papa by collecting a key from the left side of the screen and use it to unlock a chain attached to Donkey Kong on the other side of the screen. To cross the screen Donkey Kong Jr. must climb a series of platforms using vines while avoiding fierce birds, then use umbrellas to leap from heights and use balloons to move up to open a lock attached to Donkey Kong. Unlock all four chains to free papa Kong..

Trivia

Donkey Kong Jr. is one of three games from the earlier Table Top edition re-released in the Panorama Screen format. The gameplay is identical to the earlier Table Top version.

Controls Keyboard Up W or Up Arrow Down S or Down Arrow Left A or Left Arrow Right D or Right Arrow Jump CTRL or Enter Mouse Rotate Drag Press Left-click Zoom Mousewheel Resources Audio Luca Antignano ( madrgialdesign.it ) Box Art Nintandbox ( nintandbox.net ) Instructions Torsten Lindh ( intheattic.co.uk ) Textures Lee Robson ( progettosnaps.net )
